column2: Noah Holdings Ltd. provides investment advisory and wealth management services. The company is headquartered in Shanghai, Shanghai and currently employs 3,441 full-time employees. The firm operates through three segments: wealth management, asset management and Internet finance. The company also provides Internet finance services to clients in China. The company provides direct access to China's high net worth population. With approximately 1,100 relationship managers in over 130 branch offices, its coverage network includes China's regions where high net worth population is concentrated, including the Yangtze River Delta, the Pearl River Delta, the Bohai Rim and other regions. Its product offerings consist primarily of over-the-counter (OTC) wealth management and OTC asset management products, mutual fund products and asset management plans originated in China and designed to cater to the needs of China's high net worth population.
No. 1687 Changyang Road, Changyang Valley, Building 2
